level.heading: Alarms.
level.text: ยง 27-292.15 Alarms.--Where emergency warning systems are provided in spaces used by people having physical disabilities such systems shall comply with the requirements set forth in reference standard RS 4-6. Portable audible/visual smoke detecting devices in existing group J-1 occupancies shall comply with the provisions of paragraph (1) of subdivision (b) of section 27-292.9.
